amendment.description: Amendment directs the GAO to provide a report to Congress on the actions taken by the Federal Government to remove personal information from data shared through the programs established under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part A of House Report 114-88 to direct the Government Accountability Office (GAO) to provide a report to Congress on the actions taken by the Federal Government to remove personal information from data shared through the programs established by this statute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
